name: Swordfight (YeeteroniPizza)
description:
Start of a multiplayer card game. Similar to Slay the Spire or Dominion with an emphasis on reading your opponent's next move. Each round consists of both players drawing 3 cards from their own deck and choosing one card to play. Both cards are activated and both hands are discarded. Gain Poise to buy new cards at the end of each round that will be added to your deck. Build a superior deck to defeat your opponent.

Controls:

1st Player: 0-4 number keys above the alphabet

2nd Player: 0-4 number keys on the keypad or h, j, k, l, and semicolon keys for 0-4 respectively
